## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                          | Type                                                                                                           | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `noFlex` | `no-flex` | Disable default flex display in order to make the gxg-spacer-layout "justify-content" property keep working properly | `boolean`                                                                                                      | `false`   |
| `width`  | `width`   |                                                                                                                      | `"1" \| "1/2" \| "1/3" \| "1/4" \| "1/5" \| "2/3" \| "2/5" \| "3/4" \| "3/5" \| "4/5" \| "content" \| "fluid"` | `"fluid"` |
